attributes.action: Replace Ofgem with a more effective regulatory body
attributes.additional_details:
Ofgem have recently fined nPower £2million for not correctly dealing with customer complaints - this money will be recouped through bill payers.

We the undersigned call on Ofgem to be disbanded & replaced with a body committed to bringing down the disgraceful cost of utilities through windfall taxes & legislation instead of acting on trivial issues.
